description: Dashboard for Job Manager and Task Manager, prepared for versions: 1.12.X, 1.13.X

options.content:
# Uptime Description

| Color | Status|
|---|---|
| Green | < 1 Hour |
| Yellow | >= 1 Hour  |
| Orange | >= 6 Hours |
| Purple | >= 1 Day |
| Red | >= 3 days |

Input Number Bytes In Local (per Second)
Input Number Bytes In Remote (per Second)

title: Flink Job / Task Manager
